channel.title: Clicking Packet?
channel.description:
trying to fix mass clicking....
so i need to no this....
1) what packet is the clicking 1? (ex: case $$$$)
2) would it work if i put a timer around it?
ex: case 5555: if (actionTimer <= 0) { actionTimer += 4; rest of the case } break;
if u have any other fixes for mass clicking, please let me no, cuz when pking, ppl crash alot.... my gues is from mass clicking the players or spider webs, i fixed some stuff but still hapening....
so yeah.. help :)

item.title: Clicking Packet?
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

okay…

now how wuld i make clicking that much not effect gameplay?

cuz if u mass cllick on a player in wild (mass clicking trying to atk) it causes disconection…
help? :]

Read full topic

item.title: Clicking Packet?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“The Soul, post:5, topic:274505”][quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=362674.msg2755982#msg2755982 date=1240189372]
Object click one is packet 192.

NPC click one is packet 155.

http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,291645.0.html
[/quote]

Actually, packet 132 is the Object Click One packet.[/quote]

Probably, I tried naming it from memory. Thanks

Read full topic
